The bill cited as proof does not mention: It simply states that the Legislature will prioritize legislation addressing election laws.
The article from Gateway Pundit: a far-right online publication, has a history of publishing stories without factual basis or common sense.
The headline of the article makes an out: 4. The actual resolution, 2021 Assembly Resolution 3, proposed by state Rep. Scott Allen, does not contain any language about decertifying. It emphasizes the importance of conducting fair and honest elections and addressing election law violations.
